document.full_text: a new operating system allows the blackberry playbook, out next week from research in motion, to pump out high-definition flash video to a big tv screen.
document.title: r.i.m.'s playbook tablet is a whiz at flash
lines_and_colors: a new operating system allows the blackberry playbook, out next week from research in motion, to pump out high-definition flash video to a big tv screen.
